experience.description: Senior DevOps Engineer and Pod Lead working on cloud-first solutions across diverse verticals.
DevOps Intern working on software test automation, automation of enterprise user management, and JIRA project management capabilities.
DevOps Engineer working to setup automation for services on top of cloud infrastructure. Reduced operational costs and downtime for external facing services adding analytics and auditing.

Cofounder and Technical Director of initiative to provide social equity through technology. Played an architect role in medical application for pediatric clinical therapy and led agile development teams.
Grader helping facilitate understanding of challenging concepts in probability and linear algebra.
